Posts.Content: Hiya x I had a Hickman line fitted in December 2012 it was a little painfull going in but to be honest with you it is was my lifeline to having chemo and blood tests x I kept mine for 6mths with no infection and no blockages x I could of been 1 of the few who didn't have any problems x hope this helps you out x and good luck x and you come out on the other side x
Posts.Title: hickman line
